description:
"Cody's course covers everything you need to start building a kickass online business." –Scott Britton

"Cody is a pro. This course is detailed, actionable and comprehensive. Thanks for getting me up and running." –Christian Martin

"Everything you need to know about Wordpress from the Master." –John Bardos

-----

Do you want to break into online business?
By now you probably know that getting a website up and earning your first steady income on your own two feet can be very difficult as someone non-technical.

It can be damn disempowering, and I've seen it hold back WAY too many people for way too long…

But today I want to help by giving you a straightforward, step-by-step blueprint that will guide you from LITERALLY step 0 to having your OWN website, blog, and income-generating potential at your fingertips.

If you're a professional who takes what you do seriously… a subject expert who wants to make something more of your life… you have the "Linchpin" mentality and want to become an authority in your field… or even someone who wants to build your own "Lifestyle Business" so you can simply spend more time with the people you care about and enjoy your life… but you're struggling with finding the right tools, learning how to code, failed attempts at hiring developers or outsourcing…

  • You know the challenge of being a pioneer in your field but being held back by the exponential rate of change in technology.
  • You know you could earn the recognition you deserve if only given the chance.
  • And you want to have more control over your time, and be able to make money doing something meaningful…

Well let me give you the missing pieces. Zero to Hero is a comprehensive video tutorial course that will give you all the training you need to get started with a lucrative new career online… as a full-fledged card-carrying member of the New Economy, giving you a platform to build your brand and become an authority in your industry, and access exponentially more clients around the globe.

Our video lessons will SHOW YOU exactly how to purchase your first domain name, setup web hosting, DNS, how to work with FTP, cPanel, WordPress plugins and themes, backups, comments, analytics tracking, keyword tools and SEO research, SERP rankings, email autoresponders, social media sharing, Facebook apps and more…

===== Let us help you learn ALL the essential skills to… =====

  1. Build your first website…
  2. How to leverage WordPress, and other free and inexpensive tools to get your message out there to the world…
  3. Learn how to broadcast your ideas far and wide, cultivate an audience and build community around your business…
  4. Develop what very well may become your most valuable asset EVER - an email list of subscribers who care about what you have to say…
  5. Uncover previously undiscovered ideas and opportunities, and target what you have to offer with unrivaled power through understanding the basics of Search Engine Optimization practices…
  6. Discover several simple ways to start earning a basic income from your website from its early days, and ensure you see a return on your investment of time from the beginning…
  7. All the basics about engaging with people on social media - potential customers, readers, partners, etc.
  8. Have more control and flexibility over your content online…
  9. Understand the basics of techie jargon when you need to communicate your ideas to freelancers, outsourcers or employees…
  10. And LOTS more…

Get hands-on, guided experience with WordPress, Google Analytics, Thesis Theme, Wishlist Member Pro to build membership sites, AWeber for email marketing, Google Adsense, Clickbank, Feedburner, Commission Junction, Twitter, Facebook and more…

ALL of this and more, explained in plain language that you can understand, and easy-to-follow and implement video guides that show every single step of the way to guide you to greater success!

"Every first-time entrepreneur should take this course." –twentysomething serial entrepreneur Jun Loayza

"A MUST for any Internet Marketing novice!" –Shawn Rill

Over 130 lectures and 11 hours of content that will take you by the hand, every step of the way through getting started with your first domain name, all the Internet Business Basics you need to learn, using and building with WordPress step-by-step, Advanced Blogging Tips and Tactics, SEO and Link Building, Email List Building, Social Media Marketing, and Making Money with your Blog…

===== But Cody, why should I listen to you?? =====

I taught myself XHTML, CSS, and PHP and have been building websites professionally since 2006.

I quit my office job as an Administrative Assistant in 2007 to pursue my side gig full-time. I started from scratch with web design (I had no formal education in technology OR design) and grew and built it to the point where I could move abroad and travel the world FULL-TIME… and have since built an online community with my sites Thrilling Heroics and Digital Nomad Academy where I get to help others achieve similar success through marketing consulting, helping small businesses with their product launches online, personal career coaching and mentoring, and simply writing and sharing my passions with the world!

I literally started with less than a thousand dollars in my bank account and now I've worked with hundreds of amazing people, been a part of dozens of empowering and fun projects, I've coached and directly helped dozens of people to start new businesses and new lives as self-employed successes… and I've lived in 5 countries around the globe along the way! :)

===== Don't just take my word for it… Here's what some of my students say =====

"Seems I owe you a decent gin at least as reading your site has led me to getting a few small businesses together for myself."

–David McGrail

"Cody my man, you have been a freaking ANGEL sent right from heaven to me bro and I'm not kidding about it."

–Sergio Felix

"I have to tell you, you have opened my eyes to what is possible and our life will never be the same again. I now have a strong foundation and am concentrating on what I believe will be some monumental wins in the next year. When I started out, the online business world seemed like a murky, incongruent, frustrating mess. Now, I can see a very bright light at the end of the tunnel." –Tim Juliussen

"Cody McKibben is amazing. An inspiring entrepreneur/world traveler and blogger who has helped me a ton with pursuing my passions. A great person to follow, especially if you want to enter into the blogging world, start your own business and lead an unconventional life where you're following your passions and are your own boss." –Emelina Minero

"Cody McKibben isn’t your ordinary freelancer."

"Cody started out as a typical person with a regular job who decided to leave all of that behind him, including his native country, the US. He’s been doing this for the last five years and now he helps other people understand the benefits of a digital nomad lifestyle and achieve their dreams of escaping the shackles of living in one place and being bound by a 9 to 5 job."

"Cody is on a mission to show people how to lead different lives and break free from the traditional working routine." –Transitions Abroad

"He’s an archetype of the digital age and the never-before-possible lifestyle opportunities that the internet provides." –Nicholas Tart, 14clicks.com

===== Please Check Out the HUGE Amount of Content Inside This Course Below! =====

Look through all the curriculum below (there are several FREE example videos!) and the many reviews in the sidebar…

Over 130 step-by-step video tutorials, in 5 modules, PLUS 3 Bonuses:

  1. Bonus 1: Introduction to Making Money with Your Blog
  2. Bonus 2: List Building Tips with AWeber
  3. Bonus 3: Social Media Marketing with Twitter & Facebook
title: Zero to Hero: Build Your Online Business with WordPress
